portfolio.title: Stack Overflow Clone (Full Stack Project)
portfolio.description: Developed a Stack Overflow clone using MERN stack that allows users to sign up, log in, ask questions, and post answers

portfolio.title: Chat-Application (Full Stack Project)
portfolio.description: Created a realtime chat app with react, node.js and socket.io with mongodb and express.The chat app is also responsive and it is styled with the styled components.

portfolio.title: Slot Scheduling for Online Doctor Consultation (Full Stack Project)
portfolio.description: Created a website with Role Based Access Control for doctor, patient and sales team where sales team will allocate available doctors to the patients by choosing a matching time

portfolio.title: Admin Control Pannel CRUD (Full Stack Project)
portfolio.description: Created a website which allows admin to Create, Read, Update, Delete client details like name,address,email,dob,notes and set status for the client

portfolio.title: Porfolio (Front End Project)
portfolio.description: Designed a fully responsive personal portfolio website using front-end JavaScript library ReactJS and CSS

experience.title: Graduate Engineer Trainee
experience.description: Worked as a GET in Manufacturing System Engineer (MSE) department also known as Lean manufacturing department and have done several projects to reduce the lead time & manufacturing cost for manufacturing a product.

education.title: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
education.description: Finished Full Stack Development course (MERN stack) from Guvi IIT Madras and gained hands-onexperience with technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ReactJS, MySQL, MongoDB, NodeJS, ExpressJS. Applying the knowledge gain throughout the course to build production redy application
education.institute_name: Guvi IIT Madras Research Park , Chennai

education.title: Diploma in Cooperative management
education.description: Completed a Diploma course in Cooperative management with First Class . Developed managerial skills for management of a cooperative. Learnt the applications of Cooperative Law,Cooperative Management and Administration and Cooperative Credit and Banking

education.title: Bachelor of Engineering , Mechanical Engineering
education.description: Completed Bachelors in Mechanical Engineering with a CGPA of 7.01 . Won the best paper award in the National Conference in the Recent Advances in Mechanical Engineering (RAME 2019) conducted by Sriram Engineering College, Chennai on 28th February 2019
